summary: The BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff shows multiple functional and UI changes across control layouts, header/footer behavior, and routing/error-handling summaries.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed control panel authentication and admin-authorization gating (redirect unauthenticated users, access denied screen for non-admins, logout handling).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so implementing auth/authorization flows is not traceable to a requested requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed standalone control layout behavior including Internet Identity-based access gating and mobile sidebar/menu UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated Header to use backend site settings with fallbacks, added safe error-handling wrappers for router state and Internet Identity hook usage, and introduced auth modal state handling.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated Footer to load site settings and dynamically derive footer links/social links with fallbacks (including default logo/about text and social links).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/mentioned new routing and error boundary behaviors (e.g., /control/site-settings route, layout error boundaries, Suspense around Outlet) per frontend file summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; these are additional architectural behaviors beyond any stated request.
